Okay, I think I follow. I thought a major point of generator expressions is that they're not evaluated at configure time (rather, they're evaluated at generation time), but maybe it depends on the context? Or maybe these expressions will be evaluated when invoking `make install`, and at that point in time it will remove the `BUILD_INTERFACE` expressions? Obviously I'm fairly new to generator expressions, so these are some details that I'm not familiar with yet.

Your point about making the build include directory visible to other built targets is a really good one, so if it isn't harmful to the exported targets, I'm completely in favor of the suggested change.
